overview:
Anuj is a digital industry expert and is the Founder Wireles Expertise Consulting.

Anuj is a well respected strategy consultant in the mobile applications, mobile commerce and digital content sector.

Anuj has advised several companies on market expansion and new market entry including Badoo, Buongiorno, Boku, Dialogue Communications, InMobi, Venista and Openbit.

Anuj has been working in the mobile industry since 1996 and has helped in starting several mobile and web start ups.

Anuj is a recognized as a mobile industry visionary and is the author of five globally published mobile industry books and appears regularly as a telecom industry commentator in the international media.

Anuj was the Director for the Mobile Data Association representing over 100 mobile services and software companies in the UK.

Anuj has previously worked in senior business development roles in with leading brands including Hutchison Telecom, Netsize, Tanla and Dialogue Communications.

Anuj is the owner of Wireless Expertise, the company had developed smartphone applications for leading banks, retailers, Newpapers, FMCG and Fashion Brands.

Anuj has consulted with almost every major mobile payments company in the market and has experience of launching digital services in over 80 countries.
